woodmulti1.title: Wood Multiplier
woodmulti1.bought: if (!prestigeUpgrades.woodmulti1.checkIfCanBuy()) { return; }; prestigeUpgrades.woodmulti1.isBought = true; resources.pp -= prestigeUpgrades.woodmulti1.pp; prestigeUpgrades.woodmulti1.level++; prestigeUpgrades.woodmulti1.pp *= 1.5; updateVisuals();

stonemulti1.title: Stone Multiplier
stonemulti1.bought: if (!prestigeUpgrades.stonemulti1.checkIfCanBuy()) { return; }; prestigeUpgrades.stonemulti1.isBought = true; resources.pp -= prestigeUpgrades.stonemulti1.pp; prestigeUpgrades.stonemulti1.level++; prestigeUpgrades.stonemulti1.pp *= 1.5; updateVisuals();

foodmulti1.title: Food Multiplier
foodmulti1.bought: if (!prestigeUpgrades.foodmulti1.checkIfCanBuy()) { return; }; prestigeUpgrades.foodmulti1.isBought = true; resources.pp -= prestigeUpgrades.foodmulti1.pp; prestigeUpgrades.foodmulti1.level++; prestigeUpgrades.foodmulti1.pp *= 1.5; updateVisuals();
